author: Jeremy VanWinkle
comment: This is my go-to watch face.  The ambient screen is just right, which is make or break for me. I wish the actual date could be added instead of just the month.  Thanks
title: Excellent

author: Jesse Morley
comment: Love how this face looks on my Moto 360! Month of the year isn't very useful, though; an option for day of the month would be much appreciated.
title: Beautiful

author: Pratik Holla
comment: Great watch face. Any way to hide the app from the app drawer. I have a few of your watch faces and they are crowding the drawer
title: Great design
